# APPENDIX `r new_appendix()`. Project Summary Table {#app:projects}

```{r project-summary-table}
# Create a summary table of all projects
if (nrow(projects_df) > 0) {

  projects_df %>%
    select(project_id, project_title, project_leads, location, species) %>%
    rename(
      `Project ID` = project_id,
      `Title`      = project_title,
      `Leads`      = project_leads,
      `Location`   = location,
      `Species`    = species
    ) %>%
    gt() %>%
    tab_header(
      title = md("**Summary of PSSI Research Projects**")
    ) %>%
    cols_width(
      `Project ID` ~ px(80),
      `Title`      ~ px(250),
      `Leads`      ~ px(150),
      `Location`   ~ px(120),
      `Species`    ~ px(80)
    ) %>%
    opt_row_striping() %>%
    tab_style(
      style = cell_text(whitespace = "normal"),
      locations = cells_body(columns = everything())
    ) %>%
    tab_options(
      table.width = pct(100),
      data_row.padding = px(6)
    )

} else {
  cat("*No project data available.*")
}
```
